name: The Crimson Pearl
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D RPG in the style of Fated Souls and Midnight's Blessing.

The Blight has plagued The Kingdom for as long as one can remember. Characterized by a malign force that conjures up vile creatures from another world, The Blight has been the burden every citizen, from commoner to royalty, has to deal with.

Ashanti and Scarlett, two witches and therefore outcasts, believe they have found out a way to fight The Blight and defeat it once and for all. Their path to such solution will drastically change their lives. They will have to deal with hardship, betrayal and their own flaws.

FEATURES


  • A moving storyline full of twists and turns
  • A semi open-world experience where you explore the different locations in the game at your own discretion and pace
  • A vast world with varied locations to explore
  • Quest Log
  • Mouse Support
  • Up to 20 hours of gameplay
